Uses of Interface
org.springframework.security.ui.AuthenticationEntryPoint

Packages that use AuthenticationEntryPoint
org.springframework.security.ui Authentication processing mechanisms, which respond to the submission of authentication credentials using various protocols (eg BASIC, CAS, form login etc). 
org.springframework.security.ui.basicauth Authenticates HTTP BASIC authentication requests. 
org.springframework.security.ui.cas Authenticates standard web browser users via JA-SIG Central Authentication Service (CAS). 
org.springframework.security.ui.digestauth Authenticates HTTP Digest authentication requests. 
org.springframework.security.ui.ntlm   
org.springframework.security.ui.preauth   
org.springframework.security.ui.webapp Authenticates users via HTTP properties, headers and session. 
org.springframework.security.ui.x509 This package is now deprecated and will be removed in a future version. 
 

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.ui that return AuthenticationEntryPoint
 AuthenticationEntryPoint ExceptionTranslationFilter.getAuthenticationEntryPoint()
           
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.ui with parameters of type AuthenticationEntryPoint
 void ExceptionTranslationFilter.setAuthenticationEntryPoint(AuthenticationEntryPoint authenticationEntryPoint)
           
 

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui.basicauth
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.basicauth that implement AuthenticationEntryPoint
 class BasicProcessingFilterEntryPoint
          Used by the SecurityEnforcementFilter to commence authentication via the BasicProcessingFilter.
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.ui.basicauth that return AuthenticationEntryPoint
protected  AuthenticationEntryPoint BasicProcessingFilter.getAuthenticationEntryPoint()
           
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.ui.basicauth with parameters of type AuthenticationEntryPoint

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui.cas
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.cas that implement AuthenticationEntryPoint
 class CasProcessingFilterEntryPoint
          Used by the ExceptionTranslationFilter to commence authentication via the JA-SIG Central Authentication Service (CAS).
 

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui.digestauth
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.digestauth that implement AuthenticationEntryPoint
 class DigestProcessingFilterEntryPoint
          Used by the SecurityEnforcementFilter to commence authentication via the DigestProcessingFilter.
 

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui.ntlm
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.ntlm that implement AuthenticationEntryPoint
 class NtlmProcessingFilterEntryPoint
          Used by ExceptionTranslationFilter to assist with the NTLM negotiation.
 

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui.preauth
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.preauth that implement AuthenticationEntryPoint
 class PreAuthenticatedProcessingFilterEntryPoint
           In the pre-authenticated authentication case (unlike CAS, for example) the user will already have been identified through some external mechanism and a secure context established by the time the security-enforcement filter is invoked.
 

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui.webapp
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.webapp that implement AuthenticationEntryPoint
 class AuthenticationProcessingFilterEntryPoint
           Used by the SecurityEnforcementFilter to commence authentication via the AuthenticationProcessingFilter.
 

Uses of AuthenticationEntryPoint in org.springframework.security.ui.x509
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.x509 that implement AuthenticationEntryPoint
 class X509ProcessingFilterEntryPoint
          Deprecated. Use the preauth package instead
